heading: HB00020
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF A BRIDGE FROM CEBU CITY TO THE MUNICIPALITY OF CORDOVA, PROVINCE OF CEBU AND A COASTAL ROAD/EXPRESSWAY TO THE MACTAN–CEBU INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT, LAPU-LAPU CITY, AS WELL AS A BRIDGE FROM THE MUNICIPALITY OF CONSOLACION, PROVINCE OF CEBU TO THE MACTAN–CEBU INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT, LAPU-LAPU CITY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2020-03-09, transmitted to the Senate on 2020-03-11 and received by the Senate on 2020-03-11 Substituted by HB05887
